name: Eric Hofmann
text: Outstanding location and service in Madison, WI. Brought a group in on a Saturday for lunch. We utilized there buffet which had a great spread from full salad bar to pizza, pasta and desserts. The staff was very friendly and courteous with exceptional service, specifically always maintaining the buffet as  needed throughout our meal.

name: Johnathan Predaina
text: A small and busy welcome area as they just opened but fast and friendly service as one would expect. Glad to to have an alternative to Uno's gross pizza in the area!!

name: Jenny K
text: We brought my brother out for his birthday today. Great service! One of the staff members came over and took pictures for us without me having to ask. I appreciated that. The food was hot and perfect. My mom and sister enjoyed the salad bar …More

name: Jeff Meyers
text: UPDATE - October 2018 - they are in a new location and no longer have the pizza/salad buffet. They do have a great lunch special; $5.00 for a small 1-topping pizza with a soda. Very quick getting them out. The seating is much smaller than …More

name: vannigirl
text: This is probably the best pizza hut to go to. For some reason the food tastes better when you go in and sit down then when it is ordered. I would recommend this location if you are going in to sit down, maybe not the buffet but just to order a pizza yes.

name: Sebastian Astor
text: Pretty much the only consistent things about the new location are angry/short-tempered staff and wrong orders. If you ask for so much as a side of marinara they quickly get defensive about how it's easy to miss on the receipt. Buh-bye, 79 …More

name: Darin Jensen
text: Sorry, Google asked, I answered.  I don't like Pizza Hut. As far as chains go it's better than Subway but it's my bottom 5 for sure. Sorry PH, it's me not you...or is it...

name: Joey Thomas
text: Nice staff however lots of mistakes when I order sometimes.

name: Anita B.
text: Did the Wednesday dinnertime pizza buffet. Salad bar was good with choices of items to fill your plate but was messy with diners spilling ingredients all over the bar. As far as the pizza goes, we only had two kinds of pizzas to choose …More

name: Jenna Hansen
text: Clean, friendly, and fast service. Ordered inside for carry out and didn't wait long, my baby didn't even have time to fuss. Will definitely be back.

name: Thomas Wilpolt
text: One of the better pizza I've had

name: Sarah K.
text: We've given this location SO many chances, but each time our experience is terrible. We visited their buffet twice (thinking we may have just hit it on a bad night the first time) during their Wednesday night buffet deal, but regretted it …More

name: Tracy Goodman
text: We just flew in from Dayton and wanted pizza. Looked nice enough from the outside but as soon as we walked in we noticed the place smelled bad. The smell resembled molded carpet...like an old apartment! How can a pizza place not have an …More

name: E vonne Walsh
text:
The food and wait-service were great.
The management apparently was having a bad day. He was unhappy with someone in the kitchen and was loudly berating him...over and over. He was slamming pizzas …More

name: Shannon Nachtmann
text: Great service as always. Not common for Madison, especially for a chain, so it's nice to see people that can actually make an effort to do a decent job, let alone fantastic effort.

name: Richard Hertz
text: Mostly take out but has comfortable seating and tables. The $5 special is totally worth it.

name: David guyinwi
text: Last time we ordered the pizza tasted old. The time before that it was slid into the corner of the box. Time before that sauce cups were dumped over the pizza and wings had almost no sauce. Will be choosing a different pizza place from now on.

name: Christopher Rauens
text: I order from this Pizza Hut quite frequently, and the food is consistently good. I've only had one incident where a driver forgot to bring me something (a 2 liter of soda), and even though I wasn't angry, rude, or upset when I called, they …More

text: I like buffet here and I love there pizzas.

name: Paul Jones
text: The salad bar was completely awesome and Tammy was nice and served every one of our needs

name: Painter girl
text: The delivery has been soooo fast , I order online, the last two times it took only 20 minutes from start to delivery!

name: Lucio Morales
text: Ordered a pizza or a hour ago and I called to asked about it and none answered after many many attempts calling. Never received pizza

name: Carl Ziebell
text: This is a very nice little Pizza Hut.  Fine Pizza, and a nice atmosphere.  Since this establishment focuses more on take-out, the seating area wasn't huge, but felt adequate.

name: Joan Bazan
text: We hadn't been here for a while but the buffet was fine as usual! And was very disappointed to find out that they are closings this store, moving a few blocks away and will NOT HAVE THE BUFFET ANYMORE. They won't even have a dinning room. BUT... they will have personal pizzas to go in 5 min. Not sure how I feel about that

name: Jennifer Odette Kenevan
text: This place doesn't even deserve a star at all. I had the lunch buffet and as soon as I was seated in received my bill. They never once took my dirty plates...even though the server walked by me several times. I requested thin crust on the buffet. ..none..

name: Ev H TV
text: Good food slow service.

name: Life Rated
text: One of the best Pizza Hut pizzas I have ever tried! Worth the upgrades.

name: Jason Rollette
text: This place is a joke. 1 persons to hostess cashier waitress and 1 cook. 4 people waiting for carry out. Very poor management at this location.

text: Food is good, could use more staff at dinner time 2 servers just were not enough.

name: Arthur Hendrick
text: Quality depends on the server. When Heather is not there salad bar is not well maintained.  She is also very friendly

text: I usually love this pizza hut- great food, great service, and decent prices. However, when my mom and I came today, we got a very small booth, and upon asking for a new one were just told no, although other tables are available. We then …More

text: Decent lunch buffet. It's a Pizza Hut so not the best pizza in the world but was in a rush with the family and it worked.
